data.message:
#saveAleppo
#Aleppoisburning
#أنقذو_حلب
#Aleppo #Syrian 
Aleppo the biggest city in Syria located in the north of the country 
The Syrian regime bombed #Aleppo yesterday with the help of the Russian Air Force 
They targeted hospital, schools , mosques and residential neighborhoods telling the world that they're fighting ISIS
These are civilians, unarmed people, civil defense members 
So many people lost their lives to that bombing 
When less than 7 people get killed they call it a massacre!
What do you call a crime against hundreds of thousands of people ?!!

#prayforAleppo
#downwiththeSyrianregime 
#downwithISIS
#longlivetheSyrianpeople

#حلب_تحترق
